600070.name: Virtual Battlemap DLC - Space Dungeons
600070.description:
Space, 40K away in the final frontier. Dungeons where bleeding acid may come in handy! Tight corridors , wide open docking bays, or the bridge of your dream ship.. unleash your creativity in a whole new mapping genre! Mix Space Dungeons and Dungeons together to make millions of new maps. You can even mix the Space Dungeons with all other DLC for unlimited map making power!

Works Great with Pathfinder's new "Starfinder" and Warhammer play systems!


  • Over 211 new map building assets
  • 5 new panels FULL of Sapce Dungeon building content
  • Space Background Assets
  • More Ground Texture Options
  • More Decal Texture Options
